message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $115?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
